page.title: 10ANNUAL HORTICULTURAL SHOW
page.content: { Every year men come with lorries and erect a large{marquee}on the village green. At 9a.m. all{competitors}bring their produce to be judged. When it is displayed and everyone is out of the tent the{judges}begin their task of choosing the best out of each category {e.g. vegetables, cooking, flowers, {sewing, knitting and photographs. There are three prizes of money. First prize is Â£2, second is Â£1.50, and third is Â£1. On the evening there is a {dance and disco}in the marquee and an entrance fee of 50 pence is charged. After the show is over the men begin to clear away, and everyone looks forward to the show next year.
